mutants.code:
def reverse_words(s):
    s = s.lower()
    words = s.split('')
    words = words[::-1]
    reversed_s = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_s

def reverse_words(s):
    s = s.lower()
    words = s.split(' ')
    words = words[::+1]
    reversed_s = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_s

    return reversed_s

def reverse_words(s):
    s = s.lower()
    words = s.split(' ')
    words = words[::--1]
    reversed_s = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_s
